comment: He is the most amazing professor I have ever had!! So caring and fun and really makes you want to come to class. His lectures are not traditional they are very engaging and involve the whole class. 100000% recommend taking Dr. Pettigrew!!
I LOVE THIS CLASS! He is such a funny and relatable professor. Definitely very personable and loves to have a lot of fun. Definitely would take him for another class, VERY EASY A

Dr. Pettigrew is amazing and the best professor that I have had at KSU. He truly cares about his students and wants to see them succeed in his class and in life. He is easy to talk to and does not assign work outside of class. He is extremely knowledge in the PR world and gives great advice on how to make connections in the business world. 10/10!!!

100% Recommend taking Dr.P if you can! He is so inspirational & as long as you show up for class and do your part you will receive an A! He is truly amazing & so caring of his students. I wish I would have had him sooner! TAKE HIM! 🙌🏼

Dr. P is amazing. I can confidently say that he has taught me more in just 2 classes than I have learned in 4 years of college. He actually teaches useful information that is important for our future careers. He is also always available outside of class if you need help. I cannot recommend him enough, he is awesome.

Prof. Pettigrew was amazing! Being in class was actually interesting and I feel as though I actually learned some stuff this semester in this class. He does not like when people do not come to class but class is fun so it makes you want to go. Only downside was two times you had to go in front of the class and talk about yourself.  10/10
rating_tags: Participation matters--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: He's the best! Super laid back but expects everyone to get their work done. He gives plenty of time to work on the project in class and is super involved with giving feedback and helping out. He's super caring and wants to see everyone succeed. Take him if you can!

Professor Pettigrew is by far the best professor I have taken at Kennesaw. He is so understanding and so accessible. He makes the classes actually fun and coming to class so useful. Almost all of the work is done in class and he gives help and examples. I am so sad I can't take him this semester because I would take him for every class if I could.

Very caring guy at times but his syllabus is so disorganized the entire semester and will take it out on students for not turning things in on time when he changes due dates 3-4 times for each assignment. I would not recommend this class if you're actually trying to gain any knowledge of PR to feel prepared for working after college.
Super fun, relaxed class. I'm planning on taking him again in the summer and fall!

Such an amazing professor. I loved taking his grad class last semester. I always looked forward to the class discussions we would have on international PR topics. He is very philosophical and can pick your brain sometimes. I feel like I learned so much from this class and would take again in a heartbeat!!!

Veryyy Easy A because you literally learn nothing in his class. I wouldn't say don't take him because he's truly a great guy and easygoing about due dates but he's very disorganized and does not follow the syllabus at ALL. If you're taking PR Writing with him (which is an important skill needed for PR) you will not gain anything out of this class

This class was run like a PR agency. The instructions and outputs are clear, if you are able to infer. This is not a class, nor a major, that you need to be in if you need everything spelled out. 

Professor treats you like an adult.
HE IS THE BEST PROFESSOR AT KSU!! Kennesaw truly does not deserve him. He is so caring and really knows what he is talking about. Take him if you can!!

Greatest professor in the PR area at KSU. If you want to learn from someone that knows what they're doing, it's him. This class is practical but I feel I didn't take away as much as I do from his other classes.

Dr. Pettigrew is the absolute best. He has a lot of real world experience and his assignments are actually things that help you learn, not busy work. He can be a little unorganized at times, but his knowledge and passion for helping students more than make up for it. Take him if at all possible!

Dr. Pettigrew is AMAZING. He has more real world experience than any professor I've ever taken and it shows. He brings lessons from actual experience instead of just theories. He is funny, kind, and cares about students more than most professors do. He does expect you to take initiative - he won't hold your hand, but he's super helpful.

Dr. Pettigrew does a great job of sharing his own personal experience with PR in the real world. He is always open to talk to students about anything and everything, and he is very accessible to students. He assigns reasonable assignments that can help you improve in creating PR materials for the future. I would highly recommend taking him!

absolutely love Pettigrew. Finally a class and teacher that makes me excited for the PR world. He is absolutely hilarious and has been in the PR field so I really respect and listen to him. He wants everyone to get an A and he will help you get there!

Dr. P was an amazing professor. I usually hate summer classes but his was my favorite! I would recommend taking him if you can. He's very understanding, has great communication skills and really cares about his students. He also gives you enough time to do the assignments and comes around in class to give feedback - which is a major plus!

Overall he is a good teacher. He has a good personality and is funny. He is very flexible. He is not as clear with assignments as I would want him to be but is accessible outside of class for any questions. He is a tough grader, but gives good feedback. I would take him again.

I love Professor P. third semester taking him. If you can get in his class i definitely recommend. He makes PR interesting and actually makes you want to learn. No exams or quizzes and his assignments are actually things you'll be doing in the real world.

Dr. Pettigrew is the best! Don't take anyone else for Campaigns. I was worried that this capstone would take over my life, but Pettigrew has made it one of the easiest and most fun classes I've ever taken. The only reason why your grade would go down is if you decide to skip class or come in late repeatedly - come to class; it's worth it!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Pettigrew is unorganized and not a good teacher. He tells you what to do but does not teach you how or provide any examples. He has favorite students and doesn't care about the rest. Pettigrew is a tough grader, but he does not provide any feedback. I would not take him again.

Pettigrew is tough... but worth it. At times he can be demanding, difficult, etc. but he truly does care about student's success. His lessons and tips come from real-life and if you are open and honest with him you will learn something from him. This is one class I really feel I learned useful and applicable things in. Again, worth it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Dr. Pettigrew is very disorganized and does not set clear expectations for assignments. His grading system is awful. You get a grade and have no idea why. He pretends to be caring but it's all a facade. He is the worst  professor I have had in my entire academic career.
rating_tags: Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: I can't say enough good things about Dr. Pettigrew. He is the one professor I've had that made me truly enjoy class, and always made everyone feel respected. He places his focus on students really learning and getting something from the class more than anything. I only wish every other professor I had could be more like him. Take him if you can!

This professor is by far the best mentor, teacher and guide I have ever had in my 4 years of college. He genuinely cares about each student and gives you the tools to become successful after college. I wasn't sure about my major until I took him for PR principles and now I am taking him again for PR writing. Wonderful is an understatement.

Textbook and homework is online so you'll need an access code. Lectures are great, he's funny and usually ends class early. His tests are challenging and make up the majority of the points for the final grade so go to class and be sure to study! Really like him and plan on taking him again for other classes!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: He is one of the best teachers I have ever had. He uses his real-world experience to prepare his students and gives them feedback on all assignments. He actually cares about the success of his students and is an awesome teacher.

Dr. Pettigrew is my favorite instructor at KSU. Took him for PR Principles and intentionally took him again for PR Writing. The entire class is centered around building a portfolio to show off your skills that you can later use to land jobs. He's very helpful and encourages people to come to him with any questions or concerns. 5/5.

Dr. Pettigrew is awesome! He is a professor that is genuine and actually cares about his students. He is not an easy A, you will have to put in the work. When you show you have done the work, you will get a grade you want. He uses the textbook, but the online version, so save the $ get the code! If you are undecided about taking him, TAKE HIM!

Dr. P is very experienced in the PR field, and he really wants all his students to succeed. Tests are online with a lockdown browser, so you'll actually have to read & study to make an A. I don't necessarily love his lecture-style, but it's not a difficult class.
Gives work that is beneficial to your future. Gives good feedback! Hilarious and down to earth. Speaks his mind. Took him for 2 summer classes and loved it.
Dr. P is fantastic! He truly cares about his students.
Take Him!!!
Prof Pettigrew is THE best professor I have taken at KSU. He is the most "real world" type guy I have met at KSU. All of his lessons are relevant and interesting. Please take him if you can!

Holy gosh, no professor I've ever had compares to Dr. Pettigrew. He is so amazing and wants everyone to succeed. He lets you redo work to earn more credit and there are no tests. His class helped me become the writer I never thought I could be. Seriously, you won't regret taking his class. He is also a very experienced  PR professional. Take him!

I've never met a professor who was as AMAZING & CARING as Dr. P! I feel like a better student and person because of him. I ENJOYED coming to his class You will become a greater writer. He's hilarious and honest. Easy to schedule appt. with too . He would make an awesome advisor too! Yes, you need the book. You won't regret this class at all.

Dr. P is AWESOME!!!!! He's funny, extremely helpful and you can definitely tell that he cares about preparing PR students for the field. I wish more professors put that must interest in the correlation of classwork w/ our professional careers after graduation. Make sure to read the chapters - he's very picky about that. He's fabulous. Love him!

I have never taken the time or cared to fill out one of these before this class and this teacher. I learned so much in this class and became a much better writer. Dr. P is hands down the BEST professor at KSU. I have been here for four years and never had a professor so caring and passionate. TAKE HIM FOR EVERY CLASS POSSIBLE!

pettigrew is super cool. he's really chill, and fun. he makes a boring class entertaining. it's mostly discussion. no lecturing at all really. your grade: attendance, an individual meeting, 2 group projects, a paper, and 3 tests. all pretty easy. attendance is mandatory. you're seriously dumb if you take this class with any other professor.

Pettigrew is the most helpful professor I've had to date at KSU. He is relationally driven, remembers your name, and is willing to take time to speak with you . He allows you to re-turn in work after he grades and edits them so you that you  learn from your mistakes. He spends time on resumes, cover letters, and interview prep. TAKE HIM!

Dr. P is the best professor that I have had at KSU. He is hilarious, laid-back, and he truly cares about his students. All of the assignments that we completed in this class will help me in my future endeavors. He helped me build my resume and taught me how to write a cover letter. TAKE HIM!

Professor Pettigrew is awesome. He is laid-back and hilarious. He gives you the list of test questions to study, so you should get all 100's on exams. One individual paper, two group projects/papers. Just do the assignments well and he will grade fairly. Don't skip class & participate in lectures and this class should be an easy A.

Im graduating next semester and he was the first prof iv'e had where I leave class knowing iv'e learned stuff thats actually going to help me.  I took PR writing and cases with him and both classes were great.  He truly cares about the students and teaching stuff thats going to help us not just to pass tests (which he actually hates giving tests)
BEST teacher I've ever had at Kennesaw. I had him for PR writing and PR cases and they were the easiest classes. Cool project in Writing, 3 tests in PR cases.
Best teacher I've ever had in school. Was a total bro and did anything he could to help people get their grades up. You'd be dumb not to take him.
Best teacher I've ever had in school. Was a total bro and did anything he could to help people get their grades up. You'd be dumb not to take him
